# Adopting Swift File Options

**Article**

Migrate existing C code to Swift, using the file-operation options provided by the System module.

## Overview

The C options for how to open a file map to Swift as follows:

- `O_RDONLY` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/FileDescriptor/AccessMode/readOnly]
- `O_WRONLY` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/FileDescriptor/AccessMode/writeOnly]
- `O_RDWR` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/FileDescriptor/AccessMode/readWrite]

The C constants for specifying options when opening a file map to Swift as follows:

- `O_NONBLOCK` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/FileDescriptor/OpenOptions/nonBlocking]
- `O_APPEND` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/FileDescriptor/OpenOptions/append]
- `O_CREAT` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/FileDescriptor/OpenOptions/create]
- `O_TRUNC` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/FileDescriptor/OpenOptions/truncate]
- `O_EXCL` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/FileDescriptor/OpenOptions/exclusiveCreate]
- `O_SHLOCK` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/FileDescriptor/OpenOptions/sharedLock]
- `O_EXLOCK` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/FileDescriptor/OpenOptions/exclusiveLock]
- `O_NOFOLLOW` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/FileDescriptor/OpenOptions/noFollow]
- `O_SYMLINK` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/FileDescriptor/OpenOptions/symlink]
- `O_EVTONLY` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/FileDescriptor/OpenOptions/eventOnly]
- `O_CLOEXEC` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/FileDescriptor/OpenOptions/closeOnExec]

The C constants for specify seek offsets map to Swift as follows:

- `SEEK_SET` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/FileDescriptor/SeekOrigin/start]
- `SEEK_CUR` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/FileDescriptor/SeekOrigin/current]
- `SEEK_END` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/FileDescriptor/SeekOrigin/end]
- `SEEK_HOLE` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/FileDescriptor/SeekOrigin/nextHole]
- `SEEK_DATA` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/FileDescriptor/SeekOrigin/nextData]

## Adopting System

- **Adopting Swift File Operations**: Migrate existing C code to Swift, using the file operations provided by the System module.
- **Adopting Swift Error Constants**: Migrate existing C code to Swift, using the error constants provided by the System module.
